org.bytedeco.javacv

Class OpenCVFrameConverter<F>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacv.FrameConverter<F>
      • org.bytedeco.javacv.OpenCVFrameConverter<F>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OpenCVFrameConverter.ToIplImage, OpenCVFrameConverter.ToMat

    public abstract class OpenCVFrameConverter<F>
extends FrameConverter<F>
    A utility class to map data between Frame and opencv_core.IplImage or opencv_core.Mat. Since this is an abstract class, one must choose between two concrete classes: OpenCVFrameConverter.ToIplImage or OpenCVFrameConverter.ToMat.
    Author:
    Samuel Audet
